content:
Nov, vsa oprema, deluje na vsa omrežja, aparat ni vezan na nobeno naročniško razmerje...

Več info: 040 230 230

Cena: 499,99€

LASTNOSTI APARATA :


2G Omrežje: GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G omrežje: HSDPA 900/1900/2100
Dimenzije: 190.1x 120.5x 12mm
Teža: 380g
Tip ekrana: TFT capacitive touchscreem, 16M barv
Velikost: 600 x 1024 pixels. 7.0 inches
- TouchWiz UI
- Multi-touch input method
- Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate
- Three-axis gyrosensor
- Touch -sensitive controls
- Proximity sensor for auto turn-off
- Swype text input
Tip zvonenja: Polifonične, MP3, Vibro zvonenje.
Imenik: DA, Photocoall
Reža za spominsko kartico: microSD do 32GB
Spomin aparata: 16/32GB Notranji, 512MB RAM
GPRS: DA
EDGE: DA
3G: HSDPA,7.2Mbps; HSUPA, 5.76 Mbps
WLAN: Wi – Fi 802.11b/g/n
Bluetooth: DA, v3.0 A2DP
Infrared portal: NE
USB: JA, v2.0
OS: Android v2.2 (Froyo)
Sporočila: SMS,EMS, EMAIL,Push Email,IM,RSS
Brskalnik: HTML
Radio:NE
Igre: DA
Barve: Black,Grey
Fotoaparat: 3.15 MP, 2048 x 1536 Pixels, autofocus,LED flash,,Geo-Tagging,video(720x480@30fps), druga video kamera 1.3MP.



OSTALO:

java MIDP 2.1
T9
MP3/WAV/eAAC+/AC3/FLAC player
MP4/Divx/WMV/H.263/H.264 player
Zvočna beleška
Prostoročni pogovor
Organizer
3.5 mm out jack
A-GPS support
Social networking intergration
Digital compass
Full HD video playback
Up to 7h Movie playback
TV-out
Image/video editor
Thinkfree Office,(Word,Excel,PowerPoint,PDF)
Google Search,Maps, Gmail,YouTube,Calendar,Google Talk,Picasa intergration
Readers/Media/Music Hub
Adobe Flash 10.1 support
author: AIDS
